project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functionality from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion functionality from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functionality from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functionality from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functionality from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functionality from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented conversion functions to ensure they function correctly
